message.content:
Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with sliced banana, cinnamon, and a drizzle of maple syrup. Serve with fresh berries on the side.
Lunch: Quinoa salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, bell peppers, red onion, avocado, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing.
Dinner: Baked chicken breast with roasted sweet potato wedges and steamed broccoli.
Snacks: Apple slices with sunflower seed butter or carrot sticks with hummus.

Day 2:
Breakfast: Scrambled tofu with spinach, mushrooms, and turmeric. Serve with whole grain toast.
Lunch: Brown rice bowl with black beans, corn, avocado, bell peppers, and a lime-cilantro dressing.
Dinner: Grilled salmon with roasted Brussels sprouts and quinoa pilaf.
Snacks: Rice cakes with sliced pear or celery sticks with sunflower seed butter.

Day 3:
Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen mixed berries, banana, spinach, almond milk (substitute with coconut milk), and chia seeds. Topped with fresh berries and pumpkin seeds.
Lunch: Lentil soup with whole grain bread.
Dinner: Stir-fry with tofu, mixed vegetables, and brown rice.
Snacks: Grapes or sliced bell peppers with hummus.

Day 4:
Breakfast: Chia seed pudding made with coconut milk, maple syrup, vanilla extract, and fresh berries.
Lunch: Grilled portobello mushroom burger on a whole grain bun with avocado, lettuce, and tomato.
Dinner: Baked sweet potato stuffed with black beans, corn, avocado, and salsa.
Snacks: Rice crackers with sliced cucumber or a small orange.

Day 5:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and tomatoes. Serve with whole grain toast.
Lunch: Quinoa salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, bell peppers, red onion, avocado, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing.
Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with roasted asparagus and brown rice pilaf.
Snacks: Apple slices with sunflower seed butter or carrot sticks with hummus.

Day 6:
Breakfast: Smoothie made with frozen mixed berries, banana, spinach, coconut milk, and chia seeds.
Lunch: Lentil soup with whole grain bread.
Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with roasted broccoli and quinoa pilaf.
Snacks: Grapes or sliced bell peppers with hummus.

Day 7:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt alternative made with coconut milk, mixed berries, and granola (substitute with fresh fruit and seeds).
Lunch: Brown rice bowl with black beans, corn, avocado, bell peppers, and a lime-cilantro dressing.
Dinner: Grilled portobello mushroom burger on a whole grain bun with avocado, lettuce, and tomato.
Snacks: Rice cakes with sliced pear or celery sticks with sunflower seed butter.
